TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ALSourceType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Source type information, can be retrieved by AL.Source() with ALSourcei.SourceType.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourceType Static = int32(4136)

Docs.summary: Source is Static if a Buffer has been attached using AL.Source with the parameter Sourcei.Buffer.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourceType Streaming = int32(4137)

Docs.summary: Source is Streaming if one or more Buffers have been attached using AL.SourceQueueBuffers

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALSourceType Undetermined = int32(4144)

Docs.summary: Source is undetermined when it has a null Buffer attached
